title: Payload Telemetry Document
description: Stores data transmitted by payloads, either as-yet-unparsed or parsed.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a payload telemetry document. Should be 'payload_telemetry'.

estimated_time_created.title: Estimated Time Created
estimated_time_created.description: An approximation of when this document was created based on the times each listener heard it, as an RFC3339 string.

data.title: Data
data.description: All the data about this transmission, including the raw transmitted data and any parsing results.

_raw.title: Raw Data
_raw.description: The raw transmitted data, as a base64 string.

_protocol.title: Protocol
_protocol.description: The protocol (habitat parser module) used to parse this transmission.

_parsed.title: Parsed
_parsed.description: Whether this sentence has been parsed by the parser yet or not.

receivers.title: Telemetry Receivers
receivers.description: The listeners who received this telemetry and when they received it.

additionalProperties.title: Receiver
additionalProperties.description: Information about one receiver of this telemetry.

time_created.title: Time Created
time_created.description: The time, as an RFC3339 string, when the receiver created this document.

time_uploaded.title: Time Uploaded
time_uploaded.description: The time, as an RFC3339 string, when the receiver uploaded this document to the database.

latest_telemtry.title: Receiver Latest Telemtry
latest_telemtry.description: A CouchDB document ID for this receiver's most recent listener_telemetry document.

latest_info.title: Receiver Latest Info
latest_info.description: A CouchDB document ID for this receiver's most recent listener_information document.
